response.original_title: The Barber, The Astronaut and The Golf Ball
response.overview: In 1971, astronaut Alan Shepard returned from the moon and went to get a haircut. Before settling into the barber's chair in Webster, Texas, near NASA's Mission Control, Shepard gave his barber friend, Carlos Villagomez a signed golf ball.
response.title: The Barber, The Astronaut and The Golf Ball
